mapper.select: select u.id as u_id, u.avatarUrl as u_avatarUrl, u.nickname as u_nickname, ar.id, ar.articleId, ar.postUserId, ar.replyId, ar.replyUserId, ar.content, ar.likeCount, ar.state, ar.createTime, ar.updateTime from t_article_reply ar, t_user u where ar.postUserId = u.id and ar.articleId = #{articleId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and ar.deleteState = 0 order by ar.createTime desc
